v-card.description: Component for a simple card wrapper

v-card-actions.description: Add a action bar to the card

v-card-body.description: Add a card body for the card

v-card-title.description: Add a card title for the card. Useful in the card image component

v-card-subtitle.description: Add a card subtitle for the card. Useful in the card image component

v-card-footer.description: Add a card footer for the card

v-card-image.description: Set the image of the card

v-divider.description: Displays a simple horizontal line for dividing content

v-dropdown-item.description: Displays a dropdown item in a dropdown

v-footer.description: Displays a footer with a title and subtitle slot

v-footer-list.description: Creates a footer list for footer list items

v-checkbox.description: Creates a checkbox item with a label described as a slot

v-input-color.description: Creates a simple color picker with a default value

v-form-group.description: Creates a form group for example a button and a input field

v-label.description: Creates a simple form group label

v-search-bar.description: Creates a search bar with a optional button in a form group

v-frame.description: Creates a simple frame with a title, subtitle, footer and normal slot

v-row.description: Creates a row in a grid

v-col.description: Creates a column in a row

v-headline.description: Creates a headline that is bigger than the normal HTML tags

v-link.description: Create a link in Cirrus style

v-grid.description: Create a simple grid with cols and gaps

v-menu-item.description: Create a item in a menu

v-navbar.description: Navbar wrapper element for creating a navbar

v-navbar-item.description: Create a navbar item in a navbar

v-nav-dropdown-item.description: Create a navbar dropdown item in a navbar dropdown

v-nav-region.description: Set the nav region for specific navbar elements

v-next-prev.description: Wrapper component for the next prev button

v-pagination.description: Wrapper component for the pagination component

v-pagination-item.description: Creates a pagination item in a pagination component

v-parallax-element.description: Creates a parallax wrapper element for displaying a parallax effect for a element

v-placeholder-icon.description: Create a placeholder icon for the placeholder component

v-sidebar-item.description: Create a sidebar item in a sidebar component

v-sidebar-dropdown.description: Create a dropdown menu for the sidebar component

v-space.description: Create a space between components, acts as a defined margin

v-tabs.description: Create a tabs component wrapper for tab items

v-tab.description: Create a tab item in a tabs component

v-tag-container.description: Create a tag container around tags for grouping

v-tile-buttons.description: Create a wrapper for tile buttons

v-tile-content.description: Create the tile content for the tile component
